li.label: terrible bonfire
li.description: Some pathetic little flames drifted around, and they went away too soon. "Bon" fire? More like "Lame" fire.

li.label: lackluster bonfire
li.description: We were expecting a wondrous conflagration, and instead we got an oversized campfire. At least it was kinda entertaining.

li.label: good bonfire
li.description: The flames rose and crackled majestically over the settlement, and it lifted all our spirits considerably.

li.label: glorious bonfire
li.description: It was super fun and we really connected with each other with the shared experience.
